segments.text: Well , Peter . I'm sorry you're ill . What's the matter with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know , Doctor . I'm ill . I have a headache and a stomachache .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Show me your torgue.What did you eat yesterday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you eat any ice cream ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , yes , I did . I ate some ice cream .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , yes , I did . I ate some candy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Young man , tell me everything you ate yesterday evening .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: weki , Doctor . I went to a birthday party .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see ! How many pieces of cake did you eat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many plates of ice ream did you eat , young man ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Gosh , Doctor . I had only three plates of ice cream.John had four .
segments.speaker: S2
